name: Dropbox Forum Extender+
tagline: Beefs up the forums with more functionality
body:
#Dropbox Forum Extender+
Just a little script to beef up the forums, and add functionality to the forums.

##The Gist
This script adds many things to the forums, including post and thread highlighting, theming, and a message system. This can greatly increase productivity and speed when handling forum replies, which is especially good for forum Super Users and regulars.

##The Backstory
The script started as a joke between the Super Users. It all started in [this forum thread](https://forums.dropbox.com/topic.php?id=64314), and we've always said how it would be cool if we had icons, and this script did exactly that: added icons. Animated Nyan Cat icons to be exact.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
